snippet: BERGER--Barbie, born in New York, NY on January 31, 1933. Beloved mother of Jeff and Jill Berger, loving grandmother of Joshua and Juliet Berger, died of natural causes on February 22, 2016. Services will be held at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 180 W. 76th at Amsterdam Ave., on Friday, February 26 at 11am. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BERGER--Barbie, born in New York, NY on January 31, 1933. Beloved mother of Jeff and Jill Berger, loving grandmother of Joshua and Juliet Berger, died of natural causes on February 22, 2016. Services will be held at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 180 W. 76th at Amsterdam Ave., on Friday, February 26 at 11am. 1/3
